headline: Big Tech earnings, Fed meeting feature as markets end January with busiest week of Q1: What to watch
summary: As geopolitical tensions simmer in the background, Big Tech earnings and the January Fed meeting take center stage this week.

headline: The Bull Case For Valero Energy (VLO) Could Change Following Dividend Hike And Venezuelan Crude Shift
summary: Valero Energy’s board has raised the regular quarterly cash dividend on its common stock from US$1.13 to US$1.20 per share, payable on March 9, 2026, to shareholders of record on February 5, 2026, lifting the annualized payout to US$4.80 per share. At the same time, Valero has begun purchasing discounted Venezuelan crude under newly relaxed U.S. import rules, signaling a meaningful shift in its feedstock sourcing and potential refining economics. Next, we’ll examine how Valero’s higher...
